body_html:
I think that there is no way of creating scalar tensors from torch.Tensor, so I'd say that this behavior is expected?
We should deprecate torch.Tensor before the next major release, right?
body_text:
I think that there is no way of creating scalar tensors from torch.Tensor, so I'd say that this behavior is expected?
We should deprecate torch.Tensor before the next major release, right?
body:
I think that there is no way of creating scalar tensors from `torch.Tensor`, so I'd say that this behavior is expected?
We should deprecate `torch.Tensor` before the next major release, right?
